< p > [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [ARGM-TMP: on Friday] [ARGM-MNR: warmly] welcomed North Korea 's promising response to his abrupt withdrawal from the potentially historic Singapore summit and [V: said] [ARG1: " we 're talking to them now " about putting it back on track.</p] >

< p > President Donald Trump on Friday warmly welcomed North Korea 's promising response to his abrupt withdrawal from the potentially historic Singapore summit and said " we [V: 're] talking to them now " about putting it back on track.</p >

< p > President Donald Trump on Friday warmly welcomed North Korea 's promising response to his abrupt withdrawal from the potentially historic Singapore summit and said " we 're talking to them now " about [V: putting] [ARG1: it] [ARG2: back] [ARG2: on] track.</p >
